welcome.title: Welcome to Tsindeka AI
welcome.content: Your journey with Intelligence HR AI starts here. Let's explore the powerful features that will transform your HR experience.

sidebar.title: Navigation Sidebar
sidebar.content: Access your chat history, create new conversations, and navigate to different sections of the app.

newChat.title: New Chat
newChat.content: Click here to start a new conversation with the AI assistant.

chatInput.title: Chat Input
chatInput.content: This is where you'll type your questions or requests to the AI assistant.

suggestions.title: Quick Suggestions
suggestions.content: Use these pre-built suggestions to quickly access common topics like company policies and IT guidelines.

language.title: Language Selection
language.content: Change the application language to your preference.

theme.title: Theme Toggle
theme.content: Click this button to switch between dark and light themes. Currently in dark mode? Click once to switch to light mode for a brighter interface.

settings.title: Settings
settings.content: Customize your experience by changing language, theme, and other preferences.

adminPanel.title: Admin Panel
adminPanel.content: As an administrator, you can manage users, view analytics, and configure system settings here.

completion.title: Tour Complete!
completion.content: You're all set! You can restart this tour anytime by clicking the 'Start Tour' button.
